title: Third Circuit Holds State Law Claims Were Essentially Tax Refund Claims
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
A Third Circuit case issued this week demonstrates the “expansive reach” of I.R.C. § 7422, which governs federal tax refund actions. Th...
